title: Looking to create a ranked team (Bronze 3 players upwards)
body: I'm looking for keen players to form a ranked team with. I recently finished my provisionals and got placed into Bronze 3. Anyway I'm looking for any players Bronze 3 or higher to fill; Top, Mid, ADC and Supp. I prefer jungle but I can also Top if someone wishes to jg instead. If you want to join or have a trial game, message me in game: CastielZaim11 {{champion:102}}

replies.body:
Hey Im really looking to join a team!
S4 I was b1 now I am B4 due to trolls and feeders (I dont blame teams)
I can main mid top or jg 
IGN: MagenticNinja
I would really liked to join a ranked team add me I can top jg and mid but pref top/jg anyway add me if you still need people
Calm down, its not making you look any better raging at him.
Ye they were my first ranked games filled with a bunch of toxic dickheads like you
